# Introduction

Workshop / tutorial to illustrate [viash] and how [viash] fits into the workflow of a broad audience.


# Contents

This is part 1, it deals with:

- Explanation of the use-case we will develop
- A detailed description of the use-case and how we will tackle it
- The _classical_ way
- The way we do it with viash
- Creating the components
- Testing the components
- Running the components
- Use the components in a (`bash`) pipeline

In part 2 we start from the above and run the pipeline in NextFlow, and on Kubernetes.
